creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: dog on ground, head turned toward its rear quarters, front legs splayed; legs of man at L, and legs of horse at R
inscription:
Signature

-- in graphite on recto at lower left corner: 28 (written sideways)
-- in graphite on verso at lower right: APG 10625 | 870 206 / SFF
provenance: [C. & J. Goodfriend, New York; sold May 18, 1989, to Andrus]; John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie; gave to MIA, 2015. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
signed: signed in graphite below platemark, at right: [Duclaux.]
title: Dog Sleeping on Pavers at a Man's Feet
